Agreement_A.description: The monthly payment calculation is incorrect. For a $320,000 loan at 4.25% for 30 years, the correct monthly payment should be $1,574.45, not $1,574.35.
The property address listed for both borrowers (123 Main Street) is inconsistent with the Property Address in the Loan Summary section (123 Main Street).
The default interest rate of 9.25% exceeds the policy limit of no more than 5% above the initial rate (4.25%). The maximum allowed would be 9.25%.

Agreement_B.description: The LTV ratio of 70% exceeds the maximum allowed 75% for commercial properties as per the policy reference.
The monthly payment calculation is incorrect. For a $1,750,000 loan at 5.75% for 25 years (300 months), the correct payment should be $10,981.54, not $14,557.23.
The agreement lacks a clear statement on reporting requirements for ongoing monitoring, which is required as per the policy reference.

Agreement_C.description: The minimum initial draw amount of $75,000 exceeds 50% of the credit line ($150,000), violating the policy maximum of 50%.
The Combined LTV Ratio is stated as 77.27%, but based on the provided figures ($150,000 + $275,000) / $550,000, it should be 77.27%.
The agreement lacks required Truth in Lending disclosures for consumer loans as specified in the Compliance Requirements section of the policy.
